quotes.quote: It is the unknown that excites the ardor of scholars, who, in the known alone, would shrivel up with boredom.
It's the unknown that draws people.
Only the unknown frightens men. But once a man has faced the unknown, that terror becomes the known.
The unknown is too vast to live in known unhappiness.
Fear not the unknown. It is a sea of possibilities.
Be bold and fly toward the unknown. Discover a road that was never known.
It's actually quite a good ethos for life: go into the unknown with truth,commitment, and openness and mostly you'll be okay.
Prepare for the unknown by studying how others in the past have coped with the unforeseeable and the unpredictable.
The mind loves the unknown. It loves images whose meaning is unknown, since the meaning of the mind itself is unknown.
I find the lure of the unknown irresistible.
Man can learn nothing except by going from the known to the unknown.
If we fear the unknown then surely we fear ourselves.
The unknown is always interesting.
Do not fear the unknown, dare to be adventurous in life.
A fear of the unknown keeps a lot of people from leaving bad situations.
You must be fearless to travel on the journey of unknown.
Fear of the unknown is a terrible fear.
We are sickened by the unknown, but knowledge can prove poisonous.
Never be afraid to trust an unknown future to a known God.
It's much easier to work with an unknown.
Exploring the unknown requires tolerating uncertainty.
How can we live without the unknown before us?
To conquer the unknown you must trust.
The challenge of the unknown future is so much more exciting than the stories of the accomplished past.

There is nothing that man fears more than the touch of the unknown. He wants to see what is reaching towards him, and to be able to recognize or at least classify it. Man always tends to avoid physical contact with anything strange.
We all have a fear of the unknown what one does with that fear will make all the difference in the world.
Fear of the unknown is the greatest fear of all.
Most people talk about fear of the unknown, but if there is anything to fear, it is the known.
Have no fear of moving into the unknown. Simply step out fearlessly knowing that I am with you, therefore no harm can befall you; all is very, very well. Do this in complete faith and confidence.
It is good to love the unknown.
